turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I really feel like a latte from Starbucks. Can you pick one up for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm not sure, I feel like something sweet. Maybe a Caramel Brulee Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh I've had that, you'll really like it. It's sweet and the caramel has a really nice flavor. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Grande size, I really need the caffeine for that meeting this afternoon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'd like skim milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, skim milk it is. Do you want the whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Maybe a little bit, can you ask them to just put a dab on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will. Do you want it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I's like it hot, it's too cold out for an iced drink!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's true. Do you want an extra espresso shot added to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think what they normally use will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Do you want any extra sweetener added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, no other sugar besides the flavor syrup they put in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think they put some kind of sugar sprinkles on top of the drink, do you want those added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, yes, have them leave those, they seem like they would be fun.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think so too! Do you need anything else? Are you sure the skim milk is fine? They also have almond milk as an option.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I like skim in the drinks, the almond milk doesn't taste quite right to me in the drinks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. If they're out of the syrups for that drink, do you have a back up drink you'd like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, just a Grande Vanilla hot latte with skim would be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. I'll be back as soon as I can. I'll order on the app and then the wait will be less.
